title: Descent
description: In the beginning… the start of it all.Deceit.Betrayal.The Fall.Take a journey back in time, to a place where Emma’s lineage begins, and where answers lie in unraveling secrets of the past. This is a story of forbidden love, an unbreakable bond, and the start of a dark adventure that will fill your heart with many emotions.
author: Cameo Renae
